{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:46.140
    | text      = The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services figure out what the average cost of treating
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:15:50.779
    | text      = a particular type of patient is going to be, and then they set a standardized range that

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = to treat people efficiently and to provide the best possible care, so you don't end up
}}

}}
